channel.title: Server Problem?
channel.description:
my server was on for like Christmas 2010 till jan 7th When i open it it says
Server is online. now when i go to runelocus it says server is offline i go to status checker says offline also So then i try to re-port forward it and still.. No on can get on. If you can help THANKS(:

item.title: Server Problem?
item.dc:creator: @why_so_serious why so serious
item.description:
@why_so_serious wrote:

What your saying is a status checker says it’s off?
well.
Check your portforwarding/no-ip
Should fix sooner or later.

Happened to me too. Fixed over night

Read full topic
